did.unittitle: Ariadne Valsamis notes on Montauk history
did.abstract: The collection contains 26 pages of handwritten notes and photocopies of published research material covering the Montauk Indians of Long Island, Lion Gardiner, Wyandanch, and Arthur W. Benson.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred to the Brooklyn Historical Society archives, 1985.

bioghist.head: Historical note
bioghist.p: Arthur W. Benson was taken to court by the Montauks in an attempt to retain their tribal lands that Benson purchased in 1885.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains 26 pages of handwritten notes taken while Ariadne Valsamis was a volunteer performing research for the Brooklyn Historical Society's archives staff. Topics covered include: the Montauk Indians of Long Island, Lion Gardiner, Wyandanch, and Arthur W. Benson.
